document.full_text: left-wing former army commander ollanta humala won peru's presidential election and vowed the poor will share in the country's new wealth but financial markets plunged on fears that he will ruin the economy.
document.title: left-winger humala wins peru election, markets dive
lines_and_colors: left-wing former army commander ollanta humala won peru's presidential election and vowed the poor will share in the country's new wealth but financial markets plunged on fears that he will ruin the economy.
